timeline.bodyText: No need to have this as static. It can probably just be private.

timeline.bodyText: The name of the method is incorrect since it has nothing to do with quarkus dev

replies.bodyText: It doesn't even need to be a method - it can be "inlined" into the call-site ( assertThat(DevModeTestUtils....)

replies.author: Garima829

timeline.bodyText: This isn't a good idea since you introduce unnecessary coupling between the test classes. It would be better if you moved this method to LaunchUtils
timeline.author: geoand

timeline.bodyText: No need to have this protected, just make it public please

replies.bodyText: After making the change and ensuring that the test passes, you can mark the PR as ready for review

replies.bodyText: private static final Logger log gives two errors to make Logger not static and not private

replies.bodyText:
Here is an example of what I mean: 
  
    
      quarkus/extensions/amazon-lambda/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/amazon/lambda/runtime/AmazonLambdaRecorder.java
    
    
         Line 30
      in
      259758b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(AmazonLambdaRecorder.class);
